name: Jelly Penguins Demo
description:
Basic demo for a project.

You are a Sealor.  As a Sealor you are in charge of looking after a hoard of penguins. Unfortunately for you, these penguins bones are made out of Jelly. Most of them can't  even stand up! So its your job to gather them into the special 'PengoBox' for collection. 

Good Luck Sealor!.
